mapper.update: update qna set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, filename=#{filename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, filepath=#{filepath, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id=#{id}
update qna set readcnt = readcnt+1 where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select q.*, (select name from member m where m.id = q.writer) name from qna q where id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into qna (title, content, writer, filename, filepath) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{filename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filepath, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum no, n.*, (select name from member m where m.id = writer) name from (select * from qna order by id) n order by no desc) n where no between #{beginList} and #{endList}
